long_description: The lightweight Metolius Feather(TM) nut tool helps you extract cams and nuts from tight places without weighing you down. 7075 aluminum keeps the weight down to only 21g (0.74 oz.). Curved shape lets you get behind a nut to hook it and pull; tapered nose fits in small cracks. Hooked nose grabs cam trigger bars. Built-in wiregate carabiner lets you clip the Metolius Feather nut tool to your harness. Includes a palm protector on the carabiner-end of the tool.
short_description: The lightweight Metolius Feather(TM) nut tool helps you extract cams and nuts from tight places without weighing you down.
